    Interface between the AI engine and the game state
    Author:
    Amandeep Gill

    • Constructor Detail

      • AI

        public AI(int numFuncs,
  ScoreFunc[] scoreFuncs,
  boolean[] useFunc,
  int[] weights,
  Color color)
        initialize the metrics that this AI will use to evaluate the next move
        Parameters:
        numFuncs - the number of score functions for this AI to use
        scoreFuncs - the score function objects to use
        useFunc - a boolean flag for whether to use a specific score function
        weights - the weight to apply to each of the score functions

    • Method Detail

      • getMove

        public Triple<Unit,Position,Position> getMove(GameBoard board)
        Determine the best move for the AI to make
        Parameters:
        board - a copy of the current game state
        Returns:
        a Unit/from/to Triple reflecting the AI's move

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()
        Get the player color for this AI
        Returns:
        this AI's color
